!1 Testing metacompleter and creator for metadataTextVariable

| id | type | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| fitnesseTestTextVarText | coraText | | NOT_FOUND |
| fitnesseTestTextVarDefText | coraText | | NOT_FOUND |
